Literature.Title: Hybrid derivative of cathelicidin and human beta defensin-2 against Gram-positive bacteria: A novel approach for the treatment of bacterial keratitis.
Literature.Author: Ting DSJ, Goh ETL, Mayandi V, Busoy JMF, Aung TT, Periayah MH, Nubile M, Mastropasqua L, Said DG, Htoon HM, Barathi VA, Beuerman RW, Lakshminarayanan R, Mohammed I, Dua HS

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human corneal epithelial cells HCE-2:50% Cell death=>200 µg/ml,Human corneal epithelial cells HCE-2:43.9% Cytotoxicity=200 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus SH1000(MIC=200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=>200µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=200µg/ml)
